question: My teacher really tries to make class activities as _____ as possible for all students.

On the first day of class, the teacher asked to write a _____ about our family.
Do you have any idea how much pollution coal _____ causes each year?
Do you know how much that company _____ its workers?
What study _____ did she say she used to get such a high score on the test?
I can’t keep traveling to Penghu to see my girlfriend each week — it’s just not _____.
Where does the _____ used in Taiwan’s power plants come from?
How many times have you read that _____?
Did you know that before tourism, the biggest industry in Jioufen (九份) was gold _____?
Where can I learn more about cleaning up the water _____ in my town?
Where can I find a job that _____ well enough for me to buy a house in two years?

How do you think your _____ might make finding a job more difficult?
Sam has been _____ for over a year now. Do you know if he is looking for a job?

Would you mind telling me how playing video games all night is _____?
How can I _____ this problem to my boss without sounding like I’m complaining?
Do you know what the _____ for today’s meeting is? I want to know what we’ll be discussing.
Companies should make a place to work that will not _____ the workers, shouldn’t they?
Do you think that rock over there is a piece of _____?
Did you know that the number of the world’s people who live in _____ has been going down for the last 30 years?
Can you tell me why our electricity _____ are so high?
Not hiring women for this job isn’t very _____, is it?
Do you know if this company will hire a person with a _____?
Would you mind telling me how long you’ve been _____?
Our study group had a very _____ meeting yesterday — we got a lot of work done.
How do you think we can make enough money to pay for our monthly _____?
What kind of _____ do most of the people in this town work for?
When will the world’s leaders have _____ talks on cleaning the world’s oceans?
What do you think can be done to reduce air _____ in big cities?
Do you know how much _____ that factory is causing to the river?
When do you think the power plants in Taiwan will change from burning coal to a more _____ energy source?
